Package org.apache.logging.log4j.spi

Interface CleanableThreadContextMap

All Superinterfaces:
ThreadContextMap, ThreadContextMap2
All Known Subinterfaces:
ObjectThreadContextMap
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="3.0") public interface CleanableThreadContextMap extends ThreadContextMap2
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
use ThreadContextMap directly
Legacy interface for backward compatibility with extensions to ThreadContextMap. These methods have since been moved to default methods on ThreadContextMap.
Since:
2.8
